statements: SELECT * FROM public_hearings;
SELECT hearing_title, hearing_date FROM public_hearings;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings WHERE hearing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT hearing_id, hearing_title, legislation_id FROM public_hejson_hearings;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings ORDER BY hearing_date DESC;
SELECT hearing_id, hearing_title, hearing_date, comments FROM public_hearings WHERE hearing_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY hearing_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM public_hearings WHERE legislation_id = '609f0c24-d14e-4a72-b250-f2f0245585e1'
SELECT hearing_title, hearing_date FROM public_hearings WHERE hearing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY hearing_date ASC
SELECT * FROM public_hearings ORDER BY hearing_title DESC, hearing_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT hearing_title FROM public_hearings ORDER BY hearing_title ASC
SELECT * FROM public_hearings WHERE legislation_id = 1;
SELECT description, date, location FROM town_hall_meetings ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, date FROM public_hearings WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, description FROM public_hearings WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings WHERE date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT description, location FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT id, date, legislation_id FROM public_hearings WHERE legislation_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id, MIN(id) AS min_id FROM public_hearings;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings;
SELECT heading_topic, heading_date FROM public_hearings WHERE heading_location = 'City Hall';
SELECT legislation_title FROM legislation WHERE legislation_type = 'Bill';
SELECT * FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT legislation_title, legislation_status FROM legislation WHERE proposed_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM public_hearings ORDER BY heading_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT heading_topic, heading_location FROM public_hearings WHERE heading_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT heading_topic, heading_date FROM public_hearings WHERE heading_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY heading_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY meeting_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_location FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE meeting_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM public_hearings;
SELECT id, location FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE date = '2022-10-30';
SELECT name, category FROM legislation WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT id, date, location, legislation_id FROM public_hearings ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE role = 'Speaker';
SELECT * FROM public_hearings ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, category FROM legislation WHERE status='pending';
SELECT id, name FROM public_hearings WHERE location='City Hall' AND date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT attendees.name, attendees.role FROM attendees JOIN town_hall_meetings ON attendees.meeting_id = town_hall_meetings.id WHERE town_hall_meetings.location='Community Center';
SELECT public_hearings.id, public_hearings.location, attendees.name FROM public_hearings JOIN attendees ON public_hearings.id = attendees.meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings;
SELECT hearing_id, hearing_topic, location FROM public_hearings ORDER BY hearing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_name, attending_event FROM attendees WHERE attendee_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT legislation_title, status FROM legislations WHERE legislation_type = 'Bill' ORDER BY legislation_id;
SELECT * FROM public_hearings WHERE location = 'City Hall';
SELECT meeting_topic, organizer FROM town_hall_meetings WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT hearing_topic, hearing_date FROM public_hearings JOIN attendees ON public_hearings.hearing_id = attendees.attending_event WHERE attendees.attendee_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM legislations WHERE status = 'Pending' AND legislation_type = 'Bill' LIMIT 5;
SELECT meeting_topic, feedback_text, rating FROM town_hall_meetings JOIN feedback ON town_hall_meetings.meeting_id = feedback.event_id WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_text ASC;
